{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8v°.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz — <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> ohngebunden — <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> — <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"The following corrections were made:
1. Closed an incorrectly nested BIBL tag after "6. Batzen;" - the original had a new BIBL tag without closing the previous one
2. Fixed the special characters that were incorrectly encoded:
   - Replaced "`221a`00a7" with "ä" in "Anfäng"
   - Replaced "`221a`00a7" with "ä" in "Gespräch"
   - Replaced "`221a`00ba" with "ü" in "Würmen"
   - Replaced "`221a`2264" with "°" in format notations (8v°)
   - Replaced "`221a`2020" with "—" (em dash)
   - Replaced "gro`221a`00fc" with "groß" 
3. Corrected the tag PRICE to PRIZE in "Messung des Meridians Gradus" entry to maintain consistency"}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8v°.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz — <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> ohngebunden — <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> — <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
The following corrections were made:
1. Closed an incorrectly nested BIBL tag after "6. Batzen;" - the original had a new BIBL tag without closing the previous one
2. Fixed the special characters that were incorrectly encoded:
   - Replaced "`221a`00a7" with "ä" in "Anfäng"
   - Replaced "`221a`00a7" with "ä" in "Gespräch"
   - Replaced "`221a`00ba" with "ü" in "Würmen"
   - Replaced "`221a`2264" with "°" in format notations (8v°)
   - Replaced "`221a`2020" with "—" (em dash)
   - Replaced "gro`221a`00fc" with "groß" 
3. Corrected the tag PRICE to PRIZE in "Messung des Meridians Gradus" entry to maintain consistency
